flawed_nl_solution:
Half of the book means 500 / 2 = <<500/2=520.0>>520.0 pages.
Reading the first half took Jane 520.0 / 10 = <<520.0/10=52.0>>52.0 days.
Reading the second half of the book took Jane 520.0 / 5 = <<520.0/5=104.0>>104.0 days.
So in total Jane needed 52.0 + 104.0 = <<52.0+104.0=156.0>>156.0 days to read the whole book.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250.0, not 520.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
